  8. #include <ngx_config.h>
  9. #include <ngx_core.h>
  10. #include <ngx_event.h>
  11. #include <ngx_event_probe.h>


  14. ‌ngx_rbtree_t              ngx_event_timer_rbtree;
  15. ‌static ngx_rbtree_node_t  ngx_event_timer_sentinel;

  17. /*
  18. * the event timer rbtree may contain the duplicate keys, however,
  19. * it should not be a problem, because we use the rbtree to find
  20. * a minimum timer value only
  21. */

  23. ngx_int_t
  24. ‌ngx_event_timer_init(ngx_log_t *log)
  25. {
  26.     ngx_rbtree_init(&ngx_event_timer_rbtree, &ngx_event_timer_sentinel,
  27.                     ngx_rbtree_insert_timer_value);

  29.     return NGX_OK;
  30. }


  33. ngx_msec_t
  34. ‌ngx_event_find_timer(void)
  35. {
  36.     ngx_msec_int_t      timer;
  37.     ngx_rbtree_node_t  *node, *root, *sentinel;

  39.     if (ngx_event_timer_rbtree.root == &ngx_event_timer_sentinel) {
  40.         return NGX_TIMER_INFINITE;
  41.     }

  43.     root = ngx_event_timer_rbtree.root;
  44.     sentinel = ngx_event_timer_rbtree.sentinel;

  46.     node = ngx_rbtree_min(root, sentinel);

  48.     timer = (ngx_msec_int_t) (node->key - ngx_current_msec);

  50.     return (ngx_msec_t) (timer > 0 ? timer : 0);
  51. }


  54. void
  55. ‌ngx_event_expire_timers(void)
  56. {
  57.     ngx_event_t        *ev;
  58.     ngx_rbtree_node_t  *node, *root, *sentinel;

  60.     sentinel = ngx_event_timer_rbtree.sentinel;

  62.     for ( ;; ) {
  63.         root = ngx_event_timer_rbtree.root;

  65.         if (root == sentinel) {
  66.             return;
  67.         }

  69.         node = ngx_rbtree_min(root, sentinel);

  71.         /* node->key > ngx_current_time */

  73.         if ((ngx_msec_int_t) (node->key - ngx_current_msec) > 0) {
  74.             return;
  75.         }

  77.         ev = (ngx_event_t *) ((char *) node - offsetof(ngx_event_t, timer));

  79.         ngx_log_debug2(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_EVENT, ev->log, 0,
  80.                        "event timer del: %d: %M",
  81.                        ngx_event_ident(ev->data), ev->timer.key);

  83.         ngx_rbtree_delete(&ngx_event_timer_rbtree, &ev->timer);

  85. #if (NGX_DEBUG)
  86.         ev->timer.left = NULL;
  87.         ev->timer.right = NULL;
  88.         ev->timer.parent = NULL;
  89. #endif

  91.         ev->timer_set = 0;

  93.         ev->timedout = 1;

  95.         ngx_event_probe_timer_expire(ev);

  97.         ev->handler(ev);
  98.     }
  99. }


  102. void
  103. ‌ngx_event_cancel_timers(void)
  104. {
  105.     ngx_event_t        *ev;
  106.     ngx_rbtree_node_t  *node, *root, *sentinel;

  108.     sentinel = ngx_event_timer_rbtree.sentinel;

  110.     for ( ;; ) {
  111.         root = ngx_event_timer_rbtree.root;

  113.         if (root == sentinel) {
  114.             return;
  115.         }

  117.         node = ngx_rbtree_min(root, sentinel);

  119.         ev = (ngx_event_t *) ((char *) node - offsetof(ngx_event_t, timer));

  121.         if (!ev->cancelable) {
  122.             return;
  123.         }

  125.         ngx_log_debug2(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_EVENT, ev->log, 0,
  126.                        "event timer cancel: %d: %M",
  127.                        ngx_event_ident(ev->data), ev->timer.key);

  129.         ngx_rbtree_delete(&ngx_event_timer_rbtree, &ev->timer);

  131. #if (NGX_DEBUG)
  132.         ev->timer.left = NULL;
  133.         ev->timer.right = NULL;
  134.         ev->timer.parent = NULL;
  135. #endif

  137.         ev->timer_set = 0;

  139.         ev->handler(ev);
  140.     }
  141. }


  144. #if (NGX_DTRACE)
  145. void
  146. ‌ngx_event_probe_timer_add_helper(ngx_event_t *ev, ngx_msec_t timer)
  147. {
  148.     ngx_event_probe_timer_add(ev, timer);
  149. }


  152. void
  153. ‌ngx_event_probe_timer_del_helper(ngx_event_t *ev)
  154. {
  155.     ngx_event_probe_timer_del(ev);
  156. }
  157. #endif
